com.thindeck.api

Interface Base

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DyBase, MkBase, MnBase

    @Immutable
public interface Base
    Base of the entire system.

    Base is an entry point to the entire object model of the system. You start from getting an instance of this type from somewhere (depends on the implementation) and then use one of the users, repos or transactions.

    Since:
    0.1
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Yegor Bugayenko (yegor@tpc2.com)

    • Method Detail

      • user

        @NotNull(message="user can\'t be null")
User user(com.jcabi.urn.URN urn)
        Get user by URN.

        If the user is absent, it should be automatically created and returned.

        Parameters:
        urn - His URN
        Returns:
        User found or created

      • repos

        @NotNull(message="Repos can\'t be null")
Repos repos()
        Get active repositories.
        Returns:
        Repos

      • txn

        @NotNull(message="transaction can\'t be null")
Txn txn(Task task)
        Get transaction for the particular task.

        This method should either return an existing transaction or create a new one.

        Parameters:
        task - The task
        Returns:
        Transaction for the task
